com.atakmap.net

Class DeviceProfileClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.net.DeviceProfileClient

  • public class DeviceProfileClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Support querying, downloading, importing TAK Server device profiles (Mission Packages)

        Returns:

        public boolean getProfile(android.content.Context context,
                          java.lang.String server,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          boolean allowAllHostnames,
                          boolean onEnrollment,
                          boolean onConnection,
                          long syncSecago,
                          DeviceProfileCallback callback)
        Get enrollment or connection device profile Auto import the Mission Package Invoke callback
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        server - the server to connect to
        username - the username
        password - the password
        onEnrollment -
        onConnection -
        syncSecago - -1 to get all profile data. Positive value to get profile data published within this amount of time
        callback -
        Returns:
        true if request sent
